title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times. This is inefficient and should be improved.
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be a maximum of one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Use the provided test case.
2. Append multiple lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times, where N is the number of appended lines.
